attributes.action: Britain should leave Afghanistan in June 2013
attributes.additional_details: We lose good soldiers every week in Afghanistan. We cannot change the outcome in this country by our continue presence. Our politicians are happy to sacrifice young people in this country rather than making a decision that would upset the USA. Good soldiers die weekly, pointlessly, because our politicians have no courage.

rejection.details: The e-petition that already exists is titled "Pull out of Afghanistan immediately to halt further troop injuries and deaths".
